com.ephesoft.dcma.mail.service

Interface WizardMailService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WizardMailServiceImpl

    public interface WizardMailService
    This service provides APIs for sending emails for Ephesoft SignUp Screen Wizard.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    WizardMailServiceImpl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sendChangePasswordMail(User user)
      The sendChangePasswordMail method is used to send change password mail to user.
      void sendConfirmationMail(UserInformation userInformation, boolean exceptionOccured, java.lang.String exceptionStackTrace)
      API to send confirmation mail to users registering using Ephesoft SignUp Screen.
      void sendResetPasswordMail(User user)
      The sendResetPasswordMail method is used to send reset password mail to user.
